articles.author: Nancy Cook, Paige Smith
articles.title: Sensitive Bank Data Set for Deletion in CFPB Purge, Ex-Aide Says - Bloomberg
articles.description: A federal judge on Friday ordered the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to delay the deletion of data after the agency’s former chief technologist alleged that the Trump administration was about to remove a database with sensitive financial information.
